feed.title: Combined summary - Bitcoin Knots 0.14.0 release candidate 1 available

entry.title: Combined summary - Bitcoin Knots 0.14.0 release candidate 1 available
entry.summary: Bitcoin Knots has released a new major version, 0.14.0, and made their Release candidate 1 available for download. The new version includes new features, bugfixes and performance improvements. Users can find the preliminary release notes and source code on GitHub under the signed tag. It is important to verify the PGP signature of all downloads, which can be found on the official website. Release candidates are test versions and if no critical problems are found, this release candidate will be tagged as 0.14.0 final. However, if any bugs are found, a new rc will be made available after they are solved. Bugs can be reported using the issue tracker at GitHub.
